original_text: Ask God to bless people who cause trouble for you. Yes, ask him to be kind to them. Do not ask him to do bad things to them.
korean_text: 너희를 박해하는 자를 축복하라 축복하고 저주하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Yes, ask him to be kind to them
Do not ask him to do bad things to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 나쁜 일을 하도록 그에게 구하지 마세요
